name: Syndicode
tagline: Web & Mobile Apps, Ruby on Rails, Node.js, React
description:
We are about 50 engineers who breathe by techs and create web and mobile apps with Ruby on Rails, Android and iOS, Node.js and React.js. We help to create digital products for various businesses be it one page promo website, e-commerce mobile app, critical enterprise app, two-sides marketplace, SaaS, or backend for highload video streaming social network. We love building simple and unique solutions for best customer experience.
Our web and mobile developers know how to build products and services with agile iterative approach. From proof-of-concept prototype, through Minimum Viable Product to Release 1 – we cover all phases from idea to managed launch and maintenance. Clients enjoy high intelligence, discipline and best engineering talent of Syndicoders.
